articles.description: A Banksy artwork of a girl hula hooping with a bike tyre has been removed from a wall in Lenton, Nottingham after being sold to art collector John Brandler for 'a six-figure sum'.
articles.content:
A Banksy artwork has been removed from a wall in Nottingham after being sold to a collector.  
The image, of a girl hula hooping with a bike tyre, appeared on a wall on the corner of Rothesay Avenue… [+3739 chars]

articles.description: Netflix’s Behind Her Eyes adaptation really earned the book’s #WTFthatending hashtag. With huge spoilers, we delve in to the events of the finale
